basics.name: Steven Edouard
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Developer Advocate for Microsoft. Every day I work to empower individuals to build awesome things. I eventually hope to pursue a role where I can have high impact on a product.

profiles.username: This Resume is built from this Github Repo

work.summary: Technical Evangelism and Delivery - Strategic Engagements
highlights: Responsible for building reusable solutions with Microsoft partners to drive attention and usage to Microsoft products and technologies.

work.summary: Responsible for increasing adoption of Microsoft developer platforms.
highlights: Drove Azure usage by Student and Startup Developers
Worked with various Y-Combinator startups to bring linux workloads to Azure
Delivered Technical Presentations at Various conferences such as TC Disrupt SF, NodeConf Oakland, Stanford & Berkeley Hackathons
Created various technical content centered around open source on Azure such as blog posts and technical projects

work.position: Software Development Engineer in Test, Common Language Runtime
work.summary: Responsible for integration, dynamic testing and diagnostics of the Common Language Runtime.
highlights: Created innovative test validations and infrastructure for Microsoft .NET Runtime debugger and diagnostics APIs consumed by Visual Studio
Extended Visual Studio Test Explorer it to run complex end-to-end scenario tests
Assisted in customer on-boarding to .NET 4.5.1 by syncing with feature teams to diagnose issues
Drove product test results and collaborated with various feature teams across .NET to drive validation pass rates

work.summary: Obtained critical experience during college on software development for mission-critical scenarios.
highlights: Designed system requirements for autonomous underwater vehicle
Designed and implemented features on common software for use with multiple vehicles
Implemented software features for sonar system displays

volunteer.summary: High school Teacher for an inner-city computer science class.
highlights: Featured in the International New York Times

awards.name: Visual Studio Team Excellence Light House Award
awards.summary: Given to member of the Visual Studio team who goes above and beyond their role.
